config.create_and_food.chance_wild_berry: Chance of generating clusters. Smaller value = more frequent.
config.create_and_food.marble_per_chunk: How many Marble Veins spawn per chunk!
config.create_and_food.marble_veins_size: How many Marble Blocks spawn in one Vein!
config.create_and_food.ruby_ore_veins_pe: How many Ruby Ore Veins spawn per chunk!
config.create_and_food.ruby_ore_veins_si: How many Ruby Ore Blocks spawn in one Vein!
config.create_and_food.tuntal_ore_veins_: How many Tantalum Ore Veins spawn per chunk!
How many Tantalum Ore Blocks spawn in one Vein!
create_and_food.berry_bush.circumcised: §cYou can't trim the sapling because it's already trimmed or hasn't emerged yet
create_and_food.pumpkin_and_melon_bush.c: §cYou can't cut the fruit because it's already been cut or hasn't grown yet
item.create_and_food.small_dough_base_wi: Small Base of Dough with Chocolate
Small Base of Dough with Honey
jei.create_and_food.info.knife: Knives are lightweight melee weapons. They can harvest Straw from grasses, and guarantee secondary drops from animals.
jei.create_and_food.text.fragile: Fragile. Ingredient will be destroyed on wrong speed
create_and_food.ponder.blast_furnace.tex: Since this smelter works according to a different scheme, different from Minecraft’s, its operating principle is as follows:
By putting fuel in the fuel cell you will raise the heat level to a certain level. For example, blaze cake will raise the heat level by 1000°C
To remelt the metal, you need to observe the melting degree
If the melting degree is lower than required, the process will not be performed
And if the melting degree is more than required, the process will be performed faster
The main thing is to remember that the smelting furnace will cool down over time
create_and_food.ponder.cog_speedup.text_: Large and Small cogs can be connected diagonally
Shifting from large to small cogs, the conveyed speed will be doubled
Shifting the opposite way, the conveyed speed will be halved
create_and_food.ponder.fermentation_barr: As you can see, Fermentation Barrel is not connected by height
As you may have noticed Fermentation Barrel does not connect 2x2
As you may have noticed Fermentation Barrel does not connect 3x3
Connect Fermentation Barrel with a pipe
You can see that only the pipe at the top was connected
You can only pour in liquid, but you can't pump it out
In Fermentation Barrel you can place items through the auxiliary blocks, but you can't place items through the top
You can see the item fits into Fermentation Barrel
create_and_food.ponder.large_steel_cogwh: Relaying rotational force using Large Steel Cogwheels
Large cogwheels can connect to each other at right angles
It will help relaying conveyed speed to other axes of rotation
create_and_food.ponder.mechanical_blende: Processing Items with the Mechanical Blender
With a Blender and Basin, some Crafting Recipes can be automated
Available recipes include any Cutting Crafting Recipe, plus a couple extra ones
Some of those recipes may require the heat of a Blaze Burner
The filter slot can be used in case two recipes are conflicting.
create_and_food.ponder.scales.text_1: To start weighing, you need to put the item on the scales
create_and_food.ponder.scales.text_2: Then right-click on the scales with an empty hand
create_and_food.ponder.scales.text_4: To remove the item from the scales, you need to click
create_and_food.ponder.steel_cogwheel.he: Relaying rotational force using Steel Cogwheels
create_and_food.ponder.steel_cogwheel.te: Steel Cogwheels will relay rotation to other adjacent cogwheels
Neighbouring shafts connected like this will rotate in opposite directions
create_and_food.ponder.steel_cogwheel_ca: Steel Block, Secure Block, Andesite and Brass Casings can be used to decorate Cogwheels
Components added after encasing will not connect to the shaft outputs
The Wrench can be used to toggle connections
create_and_food.ponder.steel_shaft.heade: Relaying rotational force using Steel Shafts
create_and_food.ponder.steel_shaft.text_: Shafts will relay rotation in a straight line.
create_and_food.ponder.steel_shaft_casin: Steel Block, Secure Block, Andesite and Brass Casings can be used to decorate Shafts
create_and_food.ponder.terrace_all.text_: Terraces come in different types of wood, as well as terrace stairs
create_and_food.ponder.terrace_connect.t: Can be connected into 2 blocks in height
Can be connected into 3 blocks in height, but they can do more
Can be connected into 2 blocks in height
Can be connected into 3 blocks in height, but they can do more
If you have a limited number of Terrace stairs then you can use the blocks in this way
create_and_food.ponder.terminal.text_1: Having placed the ingot in Terminal for Metal Samples can you find out more information about the ingot
create_and_food.ponder.terminal.text_2: In Terminal for Metal Samples can put any identified metal
This mod component will be available in the next updates
